sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱のとき大海人皇子（天武天皇）の舎人で、皇子とともに吉野宮から東国に出立した二十数人の中の一人であった。
sen.e: He was the toneri (palace servant) of Prince Oama (Emperor Tenmu) during the Jinshin War in 672, and was among the twenty odd people that left with the Prince for Togoku from the Yoshinomiya Imperial House.

sen.j: 壬申の年（672年）の6月24日、吉野宮に隠棲していた大海人皇子は、兵を集めさせている東国に向かうため妻の鸕野讚良皇女（持統天皇）とともに急いで出発した。
sen.e: On June 24th, 672, Prince Oama who had retreated to the Yoshinomiya Imperial House, hurriedly left with his wife UNO no Sarara (Emperor Jito) to Togoku where the troops were being gathered.
